member.name: sockaddr_gen
member.summary: The sockaddr_gen union provides generic socket address information, and is used with the structure.

member.name: sockaddr_gen.Address
member.summary: IP address information expressed in a sockaddr structure.

member.name: sockaddr_gen.AddressIn
member.summary: IP address information expressed in a sockaddr_in structure.

member.name: sockaddr_gen.AddressIn6
member.summary: IP address information expressed in a sockaddr_in6_old structure.
